data.title: Waxing (warm & hot wax) Course in Norwich
data.meta_description: You will learn to complete waxing techniques; full leg, bikini, underarm, facial including eyebrows using warm wax.
data.text:
Offering a waxing service to your female clients will increase your client base instantly. From brows to bikini’s your diary will soon fill up with hair removal treatments. This is a quick, long lasting hair removal technique, lasts 4-6 weeks.

On this 1 day Fully Accredited waxing course you will learn all you need to work professionally on paying clients.

The course covers client consultation and preparation, the key health and safety elements when it comes to working with warm wax. You will learn about the types of warm wax available and the application procedure, removal techniques, you will learn how to measure & shape your clients eyebrows, aftercare tips and how to get repeat business!

Although no kit is provided, all tools and equipment is available for you to use on the training day, so just bring yourself and a spot of lunch! The training room is divided with privacy screens for all students privacy throughout the training session. Students work on each other so be prepared to give and receive a treatment. If you unable to be worked on you MUST contact us prior to booking as you may need to bring a model.

You will learn:

Health & Safety Protocols & Industry Standards

Clinical Hygiene

Social Media & Marketing Tips

Contraindications

Consultations

Tools & Equipment

Warm & Hot Waxing Techniques

Learn to wax – Full leg, Bikini, Underarm, Facial waxing including: Lip, Chin, Brows

Aftercare

You will leave confident in waxing: full leg, underarm, bikini and facial hair.

We welcome male students. You will be required to bring a female model to practice on during your training. Get in touch if you need help finding a model.
